name: Ready Set Fire!
description:
~SMALL DEMO AVAILABLE TO DOWNLOAD FOR FREE~

Control
Space - Interact
Mouse + LMB - Shoot & aiming

Description
The lost bird Qiwi was born without a wing. She is labeled as 'the broken' among her peers. And thus, she was held within the cage, experimented for a long period. Now with the new ability, she tries to escape the hellish cage, with fire...

A platformer game about a little bird with a flame launcher.
